title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and library for downloading, building and running LLMs locally with Docker-like commands.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client (PyPI: ollama) that wraps the Ollama REST API with sync/async support.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client (npm: ollama) for Node, Deno & browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration letting you use Ollama models as LLM/Chat/Embeddings components.

title: ollama-webui (Ollama-WebUI)
summary: Self-hosted ChatGPT-style web interface (now renamed Open WebUI) that talks to local Ollama.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java & Android client library published to Maven Central for integrating Ollama in JVM apps.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem providing idiomatic access to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-cli (npm)
summary: Lightweight Node CLI that wraps ollama-js for quick one-off prompts and piping.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a local GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models to be used as generators in pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community .NET SDK (NuGet: Ollama) with async streaming and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat template that connects to local Ollama for rapid prototyping of LLM apps.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & multi-model support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) published to Docker Hub for quick local/server runs.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate (ollama-rs) providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Experimental Zig client demonstrating how to consume Ollama’s streaming JSON API.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app adding Ollama chat completions with admin UI and REST endpoints.

title: ollama-qt
summary: Cross-platform Qt6 desktop GUI that manages models and chats with Ollama locally.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you run local LLM prompts inside your notes via Ollama.

title: ollama-reddit discussion
summary: Community roundup of new tools and integrations built around Ollama in 2024.
